item.title: In memory of our dear team member Jamie, the Pie office is closed today. Sessions are still going ahead. The office is open again tomorrow, but today we're taking time to remember our amazing colleague who gave us all so much and who we're going to miss hugely. üíõüíõüíõüíõüíõüíõüíõ
item.dc:creator: @PieFactoryMusic
item.description:
In memory of our dear team member Jamie, the Pie office is closed today. Sessions are still going ahead. The office is open again tomorrow, but today we're taking time to remember our amazing colleague who gave us all so much and who we're going to miss hugely.
üíõüíõüíõüíõüíõüíõüíõ

item.title:
Happy #MakeMusicDayUK! Through music, we've seen first-hand how young people can feel empowered to use their voice + have a sense of place & purpose. Just look at the Wantsum Music? x @ToneticRecords gig @RamsgateMH last month. Proudüíõ
https://youtu.be/ph0Pyordvmo
#makemusicday2022

item.title: We‚Äôre looking for a Band Room #Volunteer ü•Å aged 18-25 who is passionate about music to support our weekly Band Room sessions at Ramsgate Youth Centre. It's a drop-in music session for 13-18yrs on Tuesdays 7-9pm. Apply by Fri 24 June. Apply >> http://piefactorymusic.com/band-room-volunteer.

item.title: Steph was on @BBCRadioKent @DomKingRadio talking about our new Open Arms sessions for young asylum seekers and refugees. item.title: We‚Äôre devastated to share news that our much-loved youth worker Jamie Ferguson passed away last week after a battle with cancer. We'll be finding ways to pay tribute & honour Jamie, & the impact he made to our Pie family. Pls reach out to us if you need support at this time üíõ
item.dc:creator: @PieFactoryMusic
item.description: We‚Äôre devastated to share news that our much-loved youth worker Jamie Ferguson passed away last week after a battle with cancer. item.title: Something that makes us really happy is to see the playlists that young people have created for their own sessions on our organisational Spotify account. This is what sharing power looks like in a really tangible way ‚ô•Ô∏è

item.title:
‚≠êNEW OPEN ARMS SESSIONS for young unaccompanied asylum seekers and refugees aged 13 - 21 years old, every Friday 5-7 pm starting from 17 June! Pie is open to you üëêFriday social, with music, art, games, food in a safe and relaxed environment.
FREE ENTRY, just turn up.

FREE ENTRY, just turn up.

item.title:
RT by @PieFactoryMusic: One of my deepest loves is making music. We dug deep for this one in all of the ways. You'd help us (me and Mickey aka mas @_mas_music ) loads by pre-saving our single https://slinky.to/limboMas
Here's a sneaky peak...

item.title: RT by @PieFactoryMusic: Feeling very proud of the amazing line up our ART31 young people & team have put together for GENFest22, Kent's Youth Takeover on 18 June - so many brilliant workshops & performances & all free for 13-25s - have a browse & book now! https://thegulbenkian.co.uk/events/art31-genfest-2022/
item.dc:creator: @BeckyLees2
item.description: Feeling very proud of the amazing line up our ART31 young people & team have put together for GENFest22, Kent's Youth Takeover on 18 June - so many brilliant workshops & performances & all free for 13-25s - have a browse & book now! thegulbenkian.co.uk/events/a‚Ä¶

item.title: We have been absolutely inundated with Food Bank requests today. The demand is increasing. We want to send love to all who are struggling at this time. We're here and you're not alone ‚ô•Ô∏è
item.dc:creator: @PieFactoryMusic
item.description: We have been absolutely inundated with Food Bank requests today. The demand is increasing. We want to send love to all who are struggling at this time. We're here and you're not alone ‚ô•Ô∏è

item.title: RT by @PieFactoryMusic: I finished my day with a really encouraging meeting with schools, CCG, clinical psychologists, county and district LAs and VCS orgs talking about how we can support young people's mental health and wellbeing by working together. These things give me hope.
item.dc:creator: @StephyDickinson
item.description: I finished my day with a really encouraging meeting with schools, CCG, clinical psychologists, county and district LAs and VCS orgs talking about how we can support young people's mental health and wellbeing by working together. These things give me hope.

item.title: OPPORTUNITY: @philharmonia X Pie‚ö° 3-day music composition, technology & performance workshop for young people. Create an original piece of music alongside classically trained musicians! It's free and at Pie HQ #Ramsgate. Email adam@piefactorymusic.com #musicopportunity
item.dc:creator: @PieFactoryMusic
item.description:
OPPORTUNITY: @philharmonia X Pie‚ö°
3-day music composition, technology & performance workshop for young people. Create an original piece of music alongside classically trained musicians! It's free and at Pie HQ #Ramsgate. Email adam@piefactorymusic.com
#musicopportunity

item.title: We're sending our love to the family and friends of Julia James today and the whole community of Aylesham. Our youth club sessions will be running as usual tonight and we'll be ready to chat to young people who may need someone to talk to ‚ù§Ô∏è
